text: Ke uniharula'i ti manisaharuko brttanta pugena, jo unibhanda pahila gujrisakeka chanâ€” nuha, ada ra samudaka kaumaharu, ra ibrahimako kaumaka ra madiyanavalako ra ti ulto bastiharuka basindako unaka rasulaharu uniharuko pasama khulla nisaniharu li'era a'eka thi'e, ani allaha yasto thi'ena ki usale uniharumathi atyacara garos parantu uniharu svayanle aphumathi atyacara garirakheka thi'e
